name: Storage - The Chronicles
description:
Welcome To STC [ Storage  - The Chronicles ]

STC is a horror game in development and might contain SOME BUGS BUT I TRIED MAKING IT THE BEST OPTIMISED ( IN CASE OF BUGS ). The game required at least a 4 gb ram of computer and in case its lower than that then there is a option in pause menu to turn of graphics so you can try that.......Hope you enjoy the game.... REMEMBER IT'S JUST A VERSION 1 AND BY VERSION 2 IT WILL BE POLISHED EVEN FURTHER.....
